title: The Triumphal Entry and Teachings in Jerusalem
summary: Jesus enters Jerusalem riding a donkey, fulfilling prophecy. He clears the temple, condemning its misuse. He curses a fig tree as a symbol of fruitless faith and teaches about prayer and faith in God.

faq.question: What is a key message in Mark 11?
faq.answer: It emphasizes the servant nature of Jesus and the power of faith in action.

faq.question: What does Mark 11 reveal about Jesus?
faq.answer: It shows His authority, compassion, and call to follow Him wholeheartedly.
